sentences.sContent: BEHEADED posthumously , as punishment for his part in the execution of Charles I in 1649, Oliver Cromwell's fate after death matches his grippingly controversial life.
sentences.sContent_eng: BEHEADED posthumously , as punishment for his part in the execution of Charles I in 1649, Oliver Cromwell's fate after death matches his grippingly controversial life.
sentences.sCn: 由于在1649年参与处死查理一世，克伦威尔死后被枭首。他身后的命运与他饱受争议的一生同样为人所津津乐道。

words.tran: 死后的；遗腹的；作者死后出版的
